title: Riot , it's February
body:
It's February , and the first PBE cycle seems to be empty as hell . It's February , and I expect to see Aatrox in one of those update lists . You've said few times that he will get some buffs in preseason , and it didn't happen . You've said the same for January , and it didn't happen . The last thing you said about him , was that he will get something in February , it's time  . 

As an Aatrox main with a good winrate on him , i don't mind that much . But I continue to speak about it just for the sake of reminding you that we , Aatrox mains , exist and some of us care about him .

Only thing they said about reworking him was to give him something like Shyvana/Alistar mini rework . They were also talking about reworking him in the divers update this year , but if you read the latest dev blog post , they've said proudly that tanks/vanguards are next on the line for a class update and aatrox is clearly not one of them . 

Some buffs they could give him without making him overpowered are just some simple buffs : +30 or 35 base HP and +4 HP/lvl and also give his Q a static cooldown of 14s . 

His live version of it is : 537 hp +85hp/lvl and Q has a CD of 16/15/14/13/12 s . I think that this wouldn't make him broken or overpowered as everyone likes to think .
